summary: Removes the pesky confirm poison dialog and replaces others for HUDMessages
descriptionHtml:
No Poison Dialogs - Version 1.0

Requires:
	Skyrim v1.9.32.
	SKSE 1.6.13.

How to Install:
	1) Install SKSE 1.6.13 ([url=http://skse.silverlock.org]http://skse.silverlock.org[/url]).
	2) Install NoPoisonDialogs.
	3) Run the game with skse_loader.exe
	4) Enjoy.

What does it do?
	Removes the pesky confirm poison dialog and replaces others for HUDMessages

Is that it?
	Yes

How do I uninstall it?
	Delete \\Data\\SKSE\\Plugins\\MDX_NoPoisonDialogs.dll

I don\'t want to use SKSE.
	Cry me a river.

Contact:
	N/A

Credits:
	Mardoxx

Special thanks to:
	ianpatt, Schlangster, PLB

Changelog:
	v1.0:	Initial release
author: Mardoxx
